tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE carbon_sequestration_rates (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  land_use_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  sequestration_rate DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  measurement_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE Carbon_Sequestration (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    land_use_id INT,
    sequestration_amount DECIMAL,
    date_recorded DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (land_use_id) REFERENCES Land_Use_Data(id)
);
